**The Supreme Petition for the Elimination of Hell and Ascension to Heaven**

**Title:** *The Supreme Petition for the Elimination of Hell and Ascension to Heaven*
**Volume:** One
**Source Text:** *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, Dongxuan Section, *Weiyi* (Ritual Propriety) Category

With solemn dignity and reverent devotion,
We focus our minds in worship, reciting and upholding the secret jade scrolls, the profound and subtle treasures of the mystic vault.

May the grace of Heaven universally deliver,
May the hells all open wide,
May the sun of wisdom shine upon them,
May the light of compassion gather and receive them.

With focused minds we worship, reciting and upholding the sacred texts of the Three Treasures, the holy standards of the Nine Purities.

May great beneficence and salvation extend,
Pervading the dark and hidden realms,
Delivering beings to the Southern Palace,
Transforming and rebirthing them in the Northern Mansion.

With focused minds we worship, reciting and upholding the true teachings of the Ten Caves, the celestial hymns of the myriad heavens.

May divine compassion rescue and uplift,
May the mysterious transformation spread far and wide,
Wherever the paths of darkness lie,
May all receive extraordinary blessings.

Now, as we prepare to perform the jade register rites,
Fulfilling the golden precepts,
The Most Sacred opens the way,
The host of perfected beings ascends in their chariots.

Thus, the Nine Dark Realms converge,
The Five Sufferings all heed,
We turn and offer, praising in accordance with the Dharma.

At that time, the Most High Lord of the Primordial Beginning,
Residing in the wondrous realm of the Nine Purities, within the Three Primordials’ Jeweled Palace,
Seated upon the Kalpa-Blade Terrace amid the Qianmu Grove,
Together with the Most High Lord of the Dao, the Most High Lord Lao,
The host of celestial sages, the honored deities of the Three Realms,
The officials of the Nine Bureaus and Three Offices,
The Four Directors and Five Emperors,
The Inspecting Destiny Youths, the Perfected of Wondrous Conduct,
All arrived at once,
Riding eightfold jade chariots, five-colored jasper carriages,
Unicorns and feathered steeds,
Phoenix canopies and dragon banners,
Chanting the cave scriptures, praising the jeweled throne.

Thereupon, the Most High Lord of the Primordial Beginning,
Moved by great compassion,
Emitted rays of light,
Illuminating the Nine Dark Hells of the Underworld,
Opening all the nether bureaus and the Fengdu courts.

The assembly exclaimed:
“By what cause today,
After eons of longing,
Dwelling in eternal darkness,
Do we now receive this illumination?”

The Most High Lord of the Primordial Beginning commanded:
The Great Emperor of the Northern Capital,
The Judging Officials of the Five Emperors,
The clerks of the Six Palaces,
Ox-Headed Ghost Soldiers,
Tiger-Eyed Divine Kings,
The great demons of the Three Realms,
The multitude of souls in the Nine Dark Realms—
All the Six Palaces,
The Nine Bureaus recording life and death,
The twelve river sources,
The twenty-four prisons,
The Southern Water Assembly Palace,
The Northern Sea’s Eternal Night Court—
All received the great compassion of Heaven,
The sacred path was widely opened,
The wondrous precepts of the Nine Perfected were expounded,
To aid the dark paths of the Five Destinies.

Sincere devotion, once kindled in the flames of practice,
Will surely manifest in profound response.
Relying on the transformation of the Mysterious Origin,
We attain the gate of deliverance.
We bow our heads in reverence, devoutly repenting.

In the East are those sinners,
Confined in the prisons of wind and thunder, the dungeons of lightning.
Sword trees and blade mountains,
Flying spears and drifting halberds,
Piercing the five viscera,
Dismembering the four limbs.
Ever bound in the prisons,
Unceasing day and night.
We now offer aid,
Wishing them rebirth.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy of the Pure Capital, who expounds the teachings.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy of the Purple Palace, who bestows compassion.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who opens deliverance through Heaven and Earth.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy illumined by sun and moon.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy of the Lofty and Sacred Vessel.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy of vast and mysterious merit.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy of the turning wheel, who is self-soverign.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who undergoes refinement and rebirth.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who transcends to the highest realms.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who roams the Great Void.
We bow our heads in reverence, devoutly repenting.

In the South are those sinners,
Confined in the prisons of blazing wheels, the dungeons of debt mountains.
Fierce flames scorch their heads,
Raging fires burn their faces,
Bones reduced to ash,
Skin and flesh seared.
Ever bound in the prisons,
Unceasing day and night.
We now offer aid,
Wishing them rebirth.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy of the Mysterious Vault, who bestows transformation.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy of utmost sageliness, who extends grace.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy of compassion for the Five Sufferings.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who pities the Three Paths.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who dissolves grievances and ends disputes.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who delivers stagnant souls to rebirth.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who eliminates evil destinies.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who aids good affinities.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who ascends to the Jeweled Grotto.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who soars to the Vermilion Mound.
We bow our heads in reverence, devoutly repenting.

In the West are those sinners,
Confined in the prisons of vajra, the dungeons of iron enclosures.
Golden hammers pierce their hearts,
Iron rods penetrate their bellies,
Flesh and bones rot away,
Limbs and joints separate.
Ever bound in the prisons,
Unceasing day and night.
We now offer aid,
Wishing them rebirth.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who universally receives the sun of wisdom.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy of universal deliverance through the true wind.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy of mysterious compassion and salvation.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy of sacred power who opens the way.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who absolves transgressions.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who repents and delivers the submerged.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who transforms the traces of the Five Paths.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who turns the wheel tenfold to restore the numinous.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who responds and transforms wherever present.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who generates immortals in every place.
We bow our heads in reverence, devoutly repenting.

In the North are those sinners,
Confined in the prisons of icy depths, the dungeons of sinking.
Frigid mounds and frozen pools,
Snow spears and frost blades,
Rotten corpses shattered,
Poisonous juices poured over them.
Ever bound in the prisons,
Unceasing day and night.
We now offer aid,
Wishing them rebirth.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy of inexhaustible Dao-power.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy of boundless mysterious penetration.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who eliminates karmic offenses.

With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who redeems the sunken.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who breaks the blades of the Knife Mountain.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who shatters the points of the Sword Trees.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who swiftly traverses the Five Gates.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who transcends the Eight Portals.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who transforms and gives birth in the Purple Ultimate.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy of the Serene Azure Vault.
We bow our heads in reverence, devoutly repenting.

In the Northeast are those sinners,
Confined in the prisons of boiling cauldrons, the dungeons of furnace coals.
Their four limbs boiled to dissolution, their six viscera seared apart,
Sinews and bones putrid and foul, pus and blood melting away.
Ever bound in the prisons,
Unceasing day and night.
We now offer aid,
Wishing them rebirth.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who severs obstacles.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who extinguishes enmity.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who stills the flames of the Smoke Prison.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who dims the fires of the Fire Prison.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who restores the scattered bones to deliverance.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who refines the substance to receive rebirth.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who enables all to ascend the Sea of Blessings.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who broadly spreads the Dharma Bridge.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy whose spirits ascend to the Gardens of Lang.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy whose souls ascend to the Brahma Heavens.
We bow our heads in reverence, devoutly repenting.

In the Southeast are those sinners,
Confined in the prisons of copper pillars, the dungeons of iron beds.
Embracing with hands and climbing with feet, their bellies scorched and backs seared,
Pus and blood oozing, smoke and fire burning.
Ever bound in the prisons,
Unceasing day and night.
We now offer aid,
Wishing them rebirth.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy whose sagely transformation descends from above.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy of vast deliverance and great compassion.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy of the Great Mystery who revives the dead.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy of the Sacred Register who gives life to the spirits.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who can absolve the karmic path.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who enables escape from the Wheel of Suffering.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who ascends the Sea of Desire.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who transcends the River of Attachment.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy of the Carefree True Realm.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who soars to the Immortal Palaces.
We bow our heads in reverence, devoutly repenting.

In the Southwest are those sinners,
Confined in the prisons of butchery, the dungeons of inverted suspension.
Their five viscera and skin, their four limbs and sinews,
Pierced by knives at every hand, blood flowing across the ground.
Ever bound in the prisons,
Unceasing day and night.
We now offer aid,
Wishing them rebirth.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy whose grace descends from Heaven.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who enables ascent to higher rebirth.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who universally bestows the Dharma Rain.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who densely spreads the Clouds of Compassion.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who secretly transcends the Sea of Suffering.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who swiftly escapes the River of Ashes.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who transforms traces in the Dragon City.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who ascends to the Phoenix Palaces.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who forever departs from affliction.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who attains the carefree fruition.
We bow our heads in reverence, devoutly repenting.

In the Northwest are those sinners,
Confined in the prisons of fire chariots, the dungeons of smoking blades.
Wheels turning east and west, their four great elements torn apart,
All enmeshed in ashes and embers, enduring ceaseless torment.
Ever bound in the prisons,
Unceasing day and night.
We now offer aid,
Wishing them rebirth.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who encompasses all beings in the Round Vault.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who delivers people to the Heavens above.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who opens the path through dark realms.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who washes away flaws and blemishes.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who responds to thoughts with power.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who unites with the True through contemplation.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who dissolves karmic traces.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who eradicates evil roots.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who enables all to be born in blissful realms.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who enables all to rejoice in the Immortal Homeland.
We bow our heads in reverence, devoutly repenting.

At the Center are those sinners,
Confined in the prisons of universal plunder, the dungeons of torture.
Sword trees severing sinews, knife mountains flowing with blood,
Feet falling upon axe blades, bodies impaled on sword points.
Ever bound in the prisons,
Unceasing day and night.
We now offer aid,
Wishing them rebirth.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy whose mysterious grace universally extends.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy of inexhaustible Dharma-power.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy whose divine work saves all beings.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who transforms and completes persons.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who unites past lives with the Dao.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who gives life to the dead souls.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who sweeps away transgressions.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who repents and washes away entanglements.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who secretly dissolves karmic obstacles.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who forever departs from the dark underworld.
We bow our heads in reverence, devoutly repenting.

The Fengdu of twenty-six hundred li,
The eighty-four thousand layers of ghostly prisons,
A vast and boundless sea of suffering, churning snow-white waves a thousand fathoms deep;
A distant and endless River of Ashes, surging with smoke and waves in ten thousand forms.
No tree unpierced by frost blades,
No mountain unlined with wind knives.
Forever without the chance for deliverance,
One can only sigh at the path of sinking.
Thus we look up, relying on the precious incense,
Specially expounding the true teachings.
Proclaiming the sacred names, they universally respond in the ten directions;
Raising the sounds of the Dharma, they soar afar through the three realms.
May it be that grace descends from above,
Extending even to the hidden souls.
We now earnestly contemplate the Dao altar,
Repenting and removing the knife mountains and sword trees of hell,
Freeing them from the boiling cauldrons and furnace coals of hell.
The hells of scorching iron beds and copper pillars,
The hells of searing flames,
The hells of wheeling fire chariots and blade wheels,
The hells of thunderous plows and tongue-ripping.

The **Torture Hell**, where bodies are nailed and sawn asunder.
The **Severing Hell**, where iron nets rend limbs from joints.
The **Parting Hell**, where fire pits roast and sear.
The **Fierce Hell**, where blades and claws rend flesh.
The **Grappling Hell**, where tigers, wolves, eagles, and hounds maul.
The **Mutilation Hell**, where iron pellets are swallowed and devoured.
The **Festering Hell**, where dark mountains of rotting flesh rise.
The **Hacking Hell**, where molten bronze is drunk and molten iron imbibed.
The **Dissolving Hell**, where brine and freezing ice corrode.
The **Splitting Hell**, where the **Great Iron Enclosure Mountain Gate Hell** and the **Lesser Iron Enclosure Mountain Gate Hell** stand;
the **Iron Horse Iron Ox Hell**, the **Iron Donkey Iron Bird Hell**,
the **Iron Mountain Iron Chamber Hell**, the **Iron Chariot Iron Armor Hell**,
the **Flying Blades and Lightning Hell**, the **Dismembered Body and Severed Head Hell**,
the **Eight Cold and Eight Extreme Hells**, the **Two-Tongued and Two-Stone Hell**,
the **Burning Hands and Scorching Feet Hell**, the **Flayed Skin and Blood-Drinking Hell**,
the **Excrement and Urine Hell**, the **Minced Flesh Hell**,
the **( ) Cauldron Hell**, the **Collapsing and Burial Hell**,
the **Apapa Hell**, the **Apopo Hell**,
the **Atata Hell**, the **Arara Hell**—
such are the searing flames and fierce fires,
the biting cold and freezing ice.
Without repentance and recitation, sin and karma cannot be purged.

Thus, in accordance with the teachings and rites,
we bow in submission to the Dao’s conditions,
invoking this morning’s incense and flame,
to relieve the suffering of past kalpas and distant origins,
to rescue the benighted from the nine nights,
to extricate the tormented from the eight gates.
Moved by the sorrow of Mount Tai,
we break the stagnation of Fengdu,
hoping for the enlightened power’s grace,
to bathe in the radiance of divine compassion.

Now, with focused intent, we perform the rites.
With sincere devotion, we take refuge in the **Heavenly Worthy who Eradicates Past Karma**.
With sincere devotion, we take refuge in the **Heavenly Worthy who Delivers Sunken Souls**.
With sincere devotion, we take refuge in the **Heavenly Worthy who Severs the Three Evils**.
With sincere devotion, we take refuge in the **Heavenly Worthy who Ascends the Nine Dark Realms**.
With sincere devotion, we take refuge in the **Heavenly Worthy of Penglai’s Transformed Traces**.
With sincere devotion, we take refuge in the **Heavenly Worthy of Kunlun’s Soaring Form**.
With sincere devotion, we take refuge in the **Heavenly Worthy of Ascending Ao Island**.
With sincere devotion, we take refuge in the **Heavenly Worthy of Linzhou’s Karmic Convergence**.
With sincere devotion, we take refuge in the **Heavenly Worthy who Delivers All Without Exception**.
With sincere devotion, we take refuge in the **Heavenly Worthy who Answers Every Prayer**.
With sincere devotion, we take refuge in the **Perfected One of Great Compassion and Great Mercy, Savior from Suffering**.
With sincere devotion, we take refuge in the **Perfected One of Great Compassion and Great Mercy, Deliverer from Tribulation**.
With sincere devotion, we take refuge in the **Perfected One of Great Compassion and Great Mercy, Eradicator of Sin**.
With sincere devotion, we take refuge in the **Perfected One of Great Compassion and Great Mercy, Liberator from Calamity**.

We further repent before all the great hells,
the great ghostly prisons,
the sevenfold iron cities,
the sevenfold iron nets,
where ox-headed jailers stand—
sixty-two eyes and eight heads,
eighteen horns and nine tails,
brandishing iron halberds in their hands,
shooting iron pellets from their eyes.
Sinners are pierced from crown to sole,
pain searing bone and marrow,
agony piercing heart and liver,
begging for life yet denied,
pleading for death yet withheld.
Ground by stone mills through kalpas of rebirth,
pounded by iron pestles without respite,
smoke and fire intertwine,
birds and beasts strike and maul.
All this is the retribution of evil paths,
the summons of past karma.
Deprived of the Three Lights,
unaware of the Three Treasures.

Then the **Primordial Heavenly Worthy** declared:
If one copies this scripture,
cherishes its meaning,
quietly recites and establishes altars with images,
devoutly practices the Dao and scatters flowers,
then the **Vajra Divine Kings**, the **Heavenly Soldiers and Mighties**,
the **Five Emperors of the Three Realms**, and all spirits
will widely bestow compassion,
abundantly bring blessings,
restore bones to life,
refine form into truth.
Merciful light will gaze upon the sentient,
mysterious creation will pervade the unbounded.
Where jade bells chime, gates of salvation open;
when jade chimes resound, paths of proclamation unfold.
Relying on the wondrous model of the Nine Heavens,
entrusted to the true teachings of the Ten Caves,
ice courts transform into jade lands,
fire chambers become treasure realms.
Sword trees shatter, blade mountains break.
Thus, the long-night’s sinking shall all attain this morning’s liberation.

The Scripture concludes:
Those who hear the scripture and attain the Dao shall follow their thoughts to rebirth.
Boundless mysterious merit,
limitless enlightened grace.
May past enmities dissolve,
and future karmic ties converge.
May the three evil paths be purged,
the eight difficulties averted.
Those who hear the scripture and attain the Dao shall follow their thoughts to rebirth.
Immeasurable virtuous causes,
inexhaustible sacred power.
May the cycles of rebirth cease,
entanglements forever severed.
May evil destinies brighten,
lost souls be refined.
Those who hear the scripture and attain the Dao shall follow their thoughts to rebirth.
Infinite good roots,
unfathomable wondrous force.
May the Four Offices flow without obstruction,
the Nine Bureaus silently connect.
May souls ascend the Vermilion Mound,
spirits wander the Purple Palace.

Now that repentance is complete and rites concluded,
each enveloped in clouds of compassion,
we ascend together to the pure realm.
Thus, rainbow banners guide our steps,
feathered chariots arrive in splendor.
We soar into the great void,
carefree in the realm of ultimate bliss.

**Praise of the Scripture:**
Behold the wondrous canon of the highest rank,
the treasure trove of the central heavens,
inscribed with phoenix scripts and dragon seals,
adorned with soaring clouds and dewdrop characters.
Its merit transforms and transcends,
its power elevates and advances.
Thus, the scripture clarifies the Dao,
and the Dao establishes the scripture.
Without diligent recitation,
how can the bonds of entanglement be undone?
Those who bear sins—teeth bared, hair unbound—
those who harbor grievances—feathered and furred—
all endure water, fire, wind, and blades,
revolving through birth and death,
gathering and dispersing in the netherworld,
facing interrogation in the dark courts.
Therefore, we offer these resources,
extending repentance and deliverance.

We humbly invoke the **Golden Maidens of Incense** and the **Jade Lads of Scriptures**,
who open the eight gates above,
connect the five portals below,
proclaiming the immortal ranks of reborn souls,
transmitting the divine decrees of appointed spirits.
They enable those who turn toward them to enter the blessed immortal realms,
those who listen attentively to transcend the evil destinies.
They calm the waves of the River of Love,
provide the ferry across the Sea of Suffering.
They widely lay the Dharma bridge,
guiding all to the Dao’s shore.
Swiftly, we attend the rainbow banners and feathered regalia,
forever accompanying the crane-drawn and phoenix-borne chariots.

Amidst the seven-jeweled sutra platforms they wander and delight,
in the three-pure grotto-palaces they find joy.
The nine-flowered melodies conclude,
the myriad stones’ voices harmonize.
Having received the profound compassion,
they accomplish return to the wondrous Dao.

Now, at this dawn observance,
with the remnants of incense and flame,
we humbly pray for our ancestors of former generations,
who have not yet ascended;
for our recently departed kin,
still dwelling in the nether darkness.
May their sin-records be erased,
their evil traces swept away,
so they may swiftly be delivered by the Han Bureau,
granted passage through the open gates of Fengdu.
Together they ascend to the heavens of utmost bliss,
each gathering in the realms of rebirth.

We reflect upon our own coarse and careless transgressions,
which have entangled us in karmic bonds.
All greed for savor that harms,
all passions that wound living things—
these become knots of enmity in life,
and when life ends, the retribution body bears them.
Without the gate of repentance and redemption,
the path of entanglement remains unsolved.
Bearing grievances and debts,
all long for freedom.
Feathered flocks and furred herds,
all receive transformation.
The power of repentance and purification shines forth,
so body and speech are free from hindrance.

Reverently we invoke the Compassionate Venerables of the Golden Towers,
the Supreme Sages of the Jade Capital,
who widely open their mercy,
and specially accept our earnest prayers.
May the time of returning to simplicity
pass without the eight obstructions;
may the dawn of restoring purity
not traverse the three paths.

Before the Nine-Splendor Terrace, riding the wind and commanding qi;
Within the Five-Luminance Palace, meeting the Dao and uniting with the Real.
On white tablets, ascending to life—
the thirty-two heavens’ red writ confers destiny;
On yellow registers, erasing death—
the hundred-twenty bureaus’ black ledgers strike out names.
Those past receive grace,
those present gain blessings.
Establishing the hundred sacred titles of Purple Emptiness,
they respond to the myriad layers of the cinnabar heavens’ divine wisdom.
When the jeweled scroll unfurls,
it further strengthens the power of cultivation;
Where the numinous scripture is recited,
there arises the heart of dawn reverence.
Precious incense unceasing through the two watches,
wisdom torches ever-burning through midnight.
Boundless wondrous goodness,
measureless supreme causes.
Greatly opening the gate of refuge,
widely extending repentance.
The *Highest’s Repentance for Eliminating Hell and Ascending to Heaven* is now complete.

**The Supreme Petition for the Elimination of Hell and Ascension to Heaven**

**Title:** *The Supreme Petition for the Elimination of Hell and Ascension to Heaven*
**Volume:** One
**Source Text:** *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, Dongxuan Section, *Weiyi* (Ritual Propriety) Category

With solemn dignity and reverent devotion,
We focus our minds in worship, reciting and upholding the secret jade scrolls, the profound and subtle treasures of the mystic vault.

May the grace of Heaven universally deliver,
May the hells all open wide,
May the sun of wisdom shine upon them,
May the light of compassion gather and receive them.

With focused minds we worship, reciting and upholding the sacred texts of the Three Treasures, the holy standards of the Nine Purities.

May great beneficence and salvation extend,
Pervading the dark and hidden realms,
Delivering beings to the Southern Palace,
Transforming and rebirthing them in the Northern Mansion.

With focused minds we worship, reciting and upholding the true teachings of the Ten Caves, the celestial hymns of the myriad heavens.

May divine compassion rescue and uplift,
May the mysterious transformation spread far and wide,
Wherever the paths of darkness lie,
May all receive extraordinary blessings.

Now, as we prepare to perform the jade register rites,
Fulfilling the golden precepts,
The Most Sacred opens the way,
The host of perfected beings ascends in their chariots.

Thus, the Nine Dark Realms converge,
The Five Sufferings all heed,
We turn and offer, praising in accordance with the Dharma.

At that time, the Most High Lord of the Primordial Beginning,
Residing in the wondrous realm of the Nine Purities, within the Three Primordials’ Jeweled Palace,
Seated upon the Kalpa-Blade Terrace amid the Qianmu Grove,
Together with the Most High Lord of the Dao, the Most High Lord Lao,
The host of celestial sages, the honored deities of the Three Realms,
The officials of the Nine Bureaus and Three Offices,
The Four Directors and Five Emperors,
The Inspecting Destiny Youths, the Perfected of Wondrous Conduct,
All arrived at once,
Riding eightfold jade chariots, five-colored jasper carriages,
Unicorns and feathered steeds,
Phoenix canopies and dragon banners,
Chanting the cave scriptures, praising the jeweled throne.

Thereupon, the Most High Lord of the Primordial Beginning,
Moved by great compassion,
Emitted rays of light,
Illuminating the Nine Dark Hells of the Underworld,
Opening all the nether bureaus and the Fengdu courts.

The assembly exclaimed:
“By what cause today,
After eons of longing,
Dwelling in eternal darkness,
Do we now receive this illumination?”

The Most High Lord of the Primordial Beginning commanded:
The Great Emperor of the Northern Capital,
The Judging Officials of the Five Emperors,
The clerks of the Six Palaces,
Ox-Headed Ghost Soldiers,
Tiger-Eyed Divine Kings,
The great demons of the Three Realms,
The multitude of souls in the Nine Dark Realms—
All the Six Palaces,
The Nine Bureaus recording life and death,
The twelve river sources,
The twenty-four prisons,
The Southern Water Assembly Palace,
The Northern Sea’s Eternal Night Court—
All received the great compassion of Heaven,
The sacred path was widely opened,
The wondrous precepts of the Nine Perfected were expounded,
To aid the dark paths of the Five Destinies.

Sincere devotion, once kindled in the flames of practice,
Will surely manifest in profound response.
Relying on the transformation of the Mysterious Origin,
We attain the gate of deliverance.
We bow our heads in reverence, devoutly repenting.

In the East are those sinners,
Confined in the prisons of wind and thunder, the dungeons of lightning.
Sword trees and blade mountains,
Flying spears and drifting halberds,
Piercing the five viscera,
Dismembering the four limbs.
Ever bound in the prisons,
Unceasing day and night.
We now offer aid,
Wishing them rebirth.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy of the Pure Capital, who expounds the teachings.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy of the Purple Palace, who bestows compassion.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who opens deliverance through Heaven and Earth.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy illumined by sun and moon.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy of the Lofty and Sacred Vessel.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy of vast and mysterious merit.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy of the turning wheel, who is self-soverign.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who undergoes refinement and rebirth.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who transcends to the highest realms.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who roams the Great Void.
We bow our heads in reverence, devoutly repenting.

In the South are those sinners,
Confined in the prisons of blazing wheels, the dungeons of debt mountains.
Fierce flames scorch their heads,
Raging fires burn their faces,
Bones reduced to ash,
Skin and flesh seared.
Ever bound in the prisons,
Unceasing day and night.
We now offer aid,
Wishing them rebirth.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy of the Mysterious Vault, who bestows transformation.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy of utmost sageliness, who extends grace.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy of compassion for the Five Sufferings.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who pities the Three Paths.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who dissolves grievances and ends disputes.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who delivers stagnant souls to rebirth.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who eliminates evil destinies.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who aids good affinities.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who ascends to the Jeweled Grotto.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who soars to the Vermilion Mound.
We bow our heads in reverence, devoutly repenting.

In the West are those sinners,
Confined in the prisons of vajra, the dungeons of iron enclosures.
Golden hammers pierce their hearts,
Iron rods penetrate their bellies,
Flesh and bones rot away,
Limbs and joints separate.
Ever bound in the prisons,
Unceasing day and night.
We now offer aid,
Wishing them rebirth.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who universally receives the sun of wisdom.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy of universal deliverance through the true wind.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy of mysterious compassion and salvation.

With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who turns the wheel tenfold to restore the numinous.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who responds and transforms wherever present.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who generates immortals in every place.
We bow our heads in reverence, devoutly repenting.

In the North are those sinners,
Confined in the prisons of icy depths, the dungeons of sinking.
Frigid mounds and frozen pools,
Snow spears and frost blades,
Rotten corpses shattered,
Poisonous juices poured over them.
Ever bound in the prisons,
Unceasing day and night.
We now offer aid,
Wishing them rebirth.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy of inexhaustible Dao-power.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy of boundless mysterious penetration.
With focused minds we take refuge in the Heavenly Worthy who eliminates karmic offenses.

chunks.original_text: 楚痛地狱，钉身锯解。 断截地狱，铁网肢节。 分离地狱，火坑炮炙。 猛烈地狱，刀兵爪距。 搏撮地狱，虎狼鹰犬。 残害地狱，吞啖铁丸。 消烂地狱，暗冥肉山。 斩锉地狱，洋铜饮铁。 烂溃地狱，咸水寒冰。 坼裂地狱，大铁围山门地狱，小铁围山门地狱，铁马铁牛地狱，铁驴铁鸟地狱，铁山铁屋地狱，铁车铁衣地狱，飞刀掣电地狱，解身爪头地狱，八寒八极地狱，两舌两石地狱，然手烧脚地狱，剥皮饮血地狱，粪尿地狱，鲙肉地狱，( )鏫地狱，崩埋地狱，阿波波地狱，阿婆婆地狱，阿咤咤地狱，阿罗罗地狱。 如是焦熬猛焰，凛冽寒冰，不以忏扬，难蠲罪业。 遂乃用依科教，俯伏道缘，启今晨香火之功，为曩劫河源之苦，拯昏冥於九夜，拔楚痛於八门。 念岱岳之悲哀，辟酆都之壅滞，觊期睿力，获沐灵慈。 以今运心，谨当作礼。 志心归命，蠲消宿业天尊。 志心归命，超拔沈魂天尊。 志心归命，断灭三恶天尊。 志心归命，出陟九幽天尊。 志心归命，蓬莱化迹天尊。 志心归命，昆阆飞身天尊。 志心归命，冲升鳌岛天尊。 志心归命，缘会麟洲天尊。 志心归命，无所不度天尊。 志心归命，有念皆通天尊。 志心归命，大慈大悲救苦真人。 志心归命，大慈大悲拔难真人。 志心归命，大慈大悲灭罪真人。 志心归命，大慈大悲度厄真人。 复忏诸大地狱，诸大鬼牢，七重铁城，七重铁网，有牛头狱卒，六十二眼而八头，一十八角而九尾，手中执其铁戟，目中放其铁丸，罪人从顶而穿，从足而出，痛连骨髓，苦切心肝，求生不生，求死不死。 石磨而轮回历劫，铁碓而上下无时，烟火交飞，鸟兽击搏。 悉是恶道所感，皆由宿业所招。 不睹三光，不识三宝。 於是元始天尊告曰：若能缮写斯经，葆称其旨，静念而建坛立像，志心而行道散花，当遣金刚神王、天丁力士、三界五帝、一切众灵，大布慈悲，广臻福祉，回骸起死，炼质成真。 慈光俯鉴於有情，玄造遍施於无碍。 琼钟扣处，尽开利济之门； 玉磬锵时，悉导宣扬之路。 赖其九清妙范，托乎十洞真诠。 冰庭而变作瑶地，火屋而化为宝地。 锋摧剑树，刃断刀山。 当令长夜之沈沦，尽遂今朝之解脱。 收经 闻经得道，随念往生。 无尽玄功，无边睿爱。 复原解分宿对，缘会当来。 所堕三涂，悉蠲八难。 闻经得道，随念往生。 无量洪因，无涯圣槩。 复愿潜停轮转，永断牵缠。 恶趣腾辉，死魂受炼。 闻经得道，随念往生。 无极良因，无穷妙力。 复愿四司无滞，九署潜通。 魂度朱陵，神游紫府。 以今忏扬已蒇，礼念将周。 各拥慈云，同超净域。 遂得霓幢接步，羽驾来仪。 飞陟太虚，逍遥极乐。 叹经 详夫上品玄科，中天宝藏，列凤篆龙章之迹，缀飞云垂露之文。 功乃变通，力能升进。 是故因经所以明道，因道所以立经。 苟无敷诵之勤，焉解萦缠之道。 受罪之含齿被发，衔冤之插羽披毛，莫不水火风刀，轮回生死，会翕张於阴府，当拷讯於玄司。 是用荐资，将伸忏拔。 伏惟侍香金媛、典经玉郎，上启八门，下通五户，演死魂生身之仙品，腾神公受命之灵音。 能令归向者，开泰仙都； 谛听者，超凌恶趣。 息爱河之波浪，设苦海之舟航。 广布法桥，俱跻道岸。 速奉霓旌羽节，常陪鹤驭鸾舆。

The **Torture Hell**, where bodies are nailed and sawn asunder.
The **Severing Hell**, where iron nets rend limbs from joints.
The **Parting Hell**, where fire pits roast and sear.

the **Apapa Hell**, the **Apopo Hell**,

such are the searing flames and fierce fires,
the biting cold and freezing ice.
Without repentance and recitation, sin and karma cannot be purged.

Thus, in accordance with the teachings and rites,
we bow in submission to the Dao’s conditions,
invoking this morning’s incense and flame,
to relieve the suffering of past kalpas and distant origins,
to rescue the benighted from the nine nights,
to extricate the tormented from the eight gates.
Moved by the sorrow of Mount Tai,
we break the stagnation of Fengdu,
hoping for the enlightened power’s grace,
to bathe in the radiance of divine compassion.

With sincere devotion, we take refuge in the **Heavenly Worthy who Delivers Sunken Souls**.
With sincere devotion, we take refuge in the **Heavenly Worthy who Severs the Three Evils**.

With sincere devotion, we take refuge in the **Heavenly Worthy who Answers Every Prayer**.

With sincere devotion, we take refuge in the **Perfected One of Great Compassion and Great Mercy, Deliverer from Tribulation**.
With sincere devotion, we take refuge in the **Perfected One of Great Compassion and Great Mercy, Eradicator of Sin**.

We further repent before all the great hells,
the great ghostly prisons,
the sevenfold iron cities,
the sevenfold iron nets,
where ox-headed jailers stand—
sixty-two eyes and eight heads,
eighteen horns and nine tails,
brandishing iron halberds in their hands,
shooting iron pellets from their eyes.
Sinners are pierced from crown to sole,
pain searing bone and marrow,
agony piercing heart and liver,
begging for life yet denied,
pleading for death yet withheld.
Ground by stone mills through kalpas of rebirth,
pounded by iron pestles without respite,
smoke and fire intertwine,
birds and beasts strike and maul.
All this is the retribution of evil paths,
the summons of past karma.
Deprived of the Three Lights,
unaware of the Three Treasures.

Then the **Primordial Heavenly Worthy** declared:
If one copies this scripture,
cherishes its meaning,
quietly recites and establishes altars with images,
devoutly practices the Dao and scatters flowers,
then the **Vajra Divine Kings**, the **Heavenly Soldiers and Mighties**,
the **Five Emperors of the Three Realms**, and all spirits

abundantly bring blessings,
restore bones to life,
refine form into truth.

mysterious creation will pervade the unbounded.

when jade chimes resound, paths of proclamation unfold.
Relying on the wondrous model of the Nine Heavens,
entrusted to the true teachings of the Ten Caves,
ice courts transform into jade lands,
fire chambers become treasure realms.
Sword trees shatter, blade mountains break.

Boundless mysterious merit,
limitless enlightened grace.
May past enmities dissolve,
and future karmic ties converge.
May the three evil paths be purged,
the eight difficulties averted.
Those who hear the scripture and attain the Dao shall follow their thoughts to rebirth.
Immeasurable virtuous causes,
inexhaustible sacred power.
May the cycles of rebirth cease,
entanglements forever severed.
May evil destinies brighten,
lost souls be refined.
Those who hear the scripture and attain the Dao shall follow their thoughts to rebirth.
Infinite good roots,
unfathomable wondrous force.
May the Four Offices flow without obstruction,
the Nine Bureaus silently connect.
May souls ascend the Vermilion Mound,
spirits wander the Purple Palace.

Now that repentance is complete and rites concluded,
each enveloped in clouds of compassion,
we ascend together to the pure realm.
Thus, rainbow banners guide our steps,
feathered chariots arrive in splendor.
We soar into the great void,
carefree in the realm of ultimate bliss.

**Praise of the Scripture:**
Behold the wondrous canon of the highest rank,
the treasure trove of the central heavens,
inscribed with phoenix scripts and dragon seals,
adorned with soaring clouds and dewdrop characters.
Its merit transforms and transcends,
its power elevates and advances.
Thus, the scripture clarifies the Dao,
and the Dao establishes the scripture.
Without diligent recitation,
how can the bonds of entanglement be undone?
Those who bear sins—teeth bared, hair unbound—
those who harbor grievances—feathered and furred—
all endure water, fire, wind, and blades,
revolving through birth and death,
gathering and dispersing in the netherworld,

Therefore, we offer these resources,

proclaiming the immortal ranks of reborn souls,

They calm the waves of the River of Love,

They widely lay the Dharma bridge,
guiding all to the Dao’s shore.

forever accompanying the crane-drawn and phoenix-borne chariots.

Amidst the seven-jeweled sutra platforms they wander and delight,
in the three-pure grotto-palaces they find joy.
The nine-flowered melodies conclude,
the myriad stones’ voices harmonize.
Having received the profound compassion,
they accomplish return to the wondrous Dao.

Now, at this dawn observance,
with the remnants of incense and flame,
we humbly pray for our ancestors of former generations,
who have not yet ascended;
for our recently departed kin,
still dwelling in the nether darkness.
May their sin-records be erased,
their evil traces swept away,
so they may swiftly be delivered by the Han Bureau,
granted passage through the open gates of Fengdu.
Together they ascend to the heavens of utmost bliss,
each gathering in the realms of rebirth.

We reflect upon our own coarse and careless transgressions,
which have entangled us in karmic bonds.
All greed for savor that harms,
all passions that wound living things—
these become knots of enmity in life,
and when life ends, the retribution body bears them.
Without the gate of repentance and redemption,
the path of entanglement remains unsolved.
Bearing grievances and debts,
all long for freedom.
Feathered flocks and furred herds,
all receive transformation.
The power of repentance and purification shines forth,
so body and speech are free from hindrance.

Reverently we invoke the Compassionate Venerables of the Golden Towers,
the Supreme Sages of the Jade Capital,
who widely open their mercy,
and specially accept our earnest prayers.
May the time of returning to simplicity
pass without the eight obstructions;
may the dawn of restoring purity
not traverse the three paths.
